description:
So I thought I would let Ransom take a crack at an uncut dude.
When asked if he was ready, Marcelo replies, "Yep, lets get it over with." Not exactly the most enthusiastic beginning to a Serviced video, but certainly honest.
Fortunately, after a minute or so, Marcelo relaxes and forgets about the video playing for him. This Latin military dude looks great with Ransom's own military look. Marcelo's attitude actually reminds me a lot of the soldiers in military themed videos.
Ransom must suck some good cock, 'cuz he kept Marcelo going. Since I am filming these, we actually can move around a bit. I like not being restricted by the stationary cameras when I film myself. Plus the guys can get upright and bust all over their partner.
Nice nut shot as Marcelo busts all over Ransom's chest.
title: Marcelo & Ransom - Serviced
